channel.title: Tracking pms?
channel.description: does anyone know how to track player messages? if you do can you please tell me the code thats all i need from there im good :D

item.title: Tracking pms?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

hmm i can find regular messages ill look a lil bit more[br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2007, 07:53:44 PM[/size][hr]hmm i think i found it

would it be like this?
i eddited my chat logs once i found the packet il test it out

try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/pmlogs.txt", true)); bw.write("["+playerName+"]: Text ["+chatTextEffects+","+chatTextColor+"]: "+misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize-8)); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sendMessage("Error logging pm!"); } } }

ok i added it but it doesnt track the people with level 1 rights and up ill look more into it =.= but itd be alot easier if youd help lol but i did learn from this so thanks for not telling me right away[br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2007, 08:05:54 PM[/size][hr]oh wait nvm i forgot to change the chatText to playermessage lol

Read full topic
